summary: The module supplies a collection of utility parsers that translate textual representations of dates, times, durations, sizes, and recurring intervals into structured Python objects, along with a helper class that defines common time‑frequency constants for reuse.
business_intent: Enable the rest of the application—especially logging and scheduling components—to accept human‑readable string inputs and reliably convert them into datetime, timedelta, or numeric values, reducing repetitive parsing logic and improving configurability.
